name: BUWVUWBUWVUW
description:
music by Mehul Sharma (twitter)

BUWVUWBUWVUW is a fast paced shooter where you try to survive hordes of monsters switching between two views. One view gives you health, the other give you ammo and new guns to fight crazier monsters

Please Read how to play:

WASD for Movement

F to Switch Phases

Space To Dodge 

LMB To shoot

When you switch to health phase, you will gain health

when you switch to ammo phase you will gain ammo

Stay in the ammo view with full ammo to get upgrade your weapons

Survive

this game was made for BYOG2021 game jam by mridul pancholi and mehul sharma
